# LlamaIndex

DATA SCIENCE & AI

LlamaIndex.ai is a data framework designed to facilitate the ingestion, transformation, and querying of unstructured data using large language models (LLMs). It simplifies the process of building applications that utilize natural language processing and machine learning by providing a suite of tools for seamless data integration and analysis.

## LlamaIndex.ai + MotherDuck

LlamaIndex.ai integrates with MotherDuck by leveraging DuckDB's capabilities to query structured data efficiently within the MotherDuck cloud data warehouse environment. This integration allows users to combine unstructured data handling from LlamaIndex.ai with the high-performance querying and storage solutions provided by MotherDuck, enabling comprehensive data analysis workflows.
